1 // $Id: InputTextMask.js 100 2008-02-26 09:38:02Z bobbicat71 $
  2 
  3 Ext.namespace('Ext.ux.netbox');
  4 
  5 /** It creates a new input text mask.
  6  * @class InputTextMask is a plugin for Ext.form.TextField, used to add an input mask to the field.
  7  * Mask Individual Character Usage:
  8  * <ul>
  9  * <li>9 - designates only numeric values</li>
 10  * <li>L - designates only uppercase letter values</li>
 11  * <li>l - designates only lowercase letter values</li>
 12  * <li>A - designates only alphanumeric values</li>
 13  * <li>X - denotes that a custom client script regular expression is specified</li>
 14  *</ul>
 15  * All other characters are assumed to be "special" characters used to mask the input component.
 16  * <h4>Example 1:</h4>
 17  * (999)999-9999 only numeric values can be entered where the the character
 18  * position value is 9. Parenthesis and dash are non-editable/mask characters.
 19  * <h4>Example 2:</h4>
 20  * 99L-ll-X[^A-C]X only numeric values for the first two characters,
 21  * uppercase values for the third character, lowercase letters for the
 22  * fifth/sixth characters, and the last character X[^A-C]X together counts
 23  * as the eighth character regular expression that would allow all characters
 24  * but "A", "B", and "C". Dashes outside the regular expression are non-editable/mask characters.
 25  * @constructor
 26  * @param (String) mask The input mask defining string
 27  * @param (boolean) clearWhenInvalid True to clear the mask when the field blurs and the text is invalid. Optional, default is true.
 28  */
 29 Ext.ux.netbox.InputTextMask = function(mask,clearWhenInvalid) {
 30 
 31     if(clearWhenInvalid === undefined){
 32       this.clearWhenInvalid = true;
 33     }else{
 34       this.clearWhenInvalid = clearWhenInvalid;
 35     }
 36     this.rawMask = mask;
 37     this.viewMask = '';
 38     this.maskArray = [];
 39     var mai = 0;
 40     var regexp = '';
 41     for(var i=0; i<mask.length; i++){
 42         if(regexp){
 43             if(regexp == 'X'){
 44                 regexp = '';
 45             }
 46             if(mask.charAt(i) == 'X'){
 47                 this.maskArray[mai] = regexp;
 48                 mai++;
 49                 regexp = '';
 50             } else {
 51                 regexp += mask.charAt(i);
 52             }
 53         } else if(mask.charAt(i) == 'X'){
 54             regexp += 'X';
 55             this.viewMask += '_';
 56         } else if(mask.charAt(i) == '9' || mask.charAt(i) == 'L' || mask.charAt(i) == 'l' || mask.charAt(i) == 'A') {
 57             this.viewMask += '_';
 58             this.maskArray[mai] = mask.charAt(i);
 59             mai++;
 60         } else {
 61             this.viewMask += mask.charAt(i);
 62             this.maskArray[mai] = RegExp.escape(mask.charAt(i));
 63             mai++;
 64         }
 65     }
 66 
 67     this.specialChars = this.viewMask.replace(/(L|l|9|A|_|X)/g,'');
 68 };
 69 
 70 Ext.ux.netbox.InputTextMask.prototype = {
 71 
 72     init : function(field) {
 73         this.field = field;
 74 
 75         if (field.rendered){
 76             this.assignEl();
 77         } else {
 78             field.on('render', this.assignEl, this);
 79         }
 80 
 81         field.on('blur',this.removeValueWhenInvalid, this);
 82         field.on('focus',this.processMaskFocus, this);
 83     },
 84 
 85     assignEl : function() {
 86         this.inputTextElement = this.field.getEl().dom;
 87         this.field.getEl().on('keypress', this.processKeyPress, this);
 88         this.field.getEl().on('keydown', this.processKeyDown, this);
 89         if(Ext.isSafari || Ext.isIE){
 90             this.field.getEl().on('paste',this.startTask,this);
 91             this.field.getEl().on('cut',this.startTask,this);
 92         }
 93         if(Ext.isGecko || Ext.isOpera){
 94             this.field.getEl().on('mousedown',this.setPreviousValue,this);
 95         }
 96         if(Ext.isGecko){
 97           this.field.getEl().on('input',this.onInput,this);
 98         }
 99         if(Ext.isOpera){
100           this.field.getEl().on('input',this.onInputOpera,this);
101         }
102     },
103     onInput : function(){
104         this.startTask(false);
105     },
106     onInputOpera : function(){
107       if(!this.prevValueOpera){
108         this.startTask(false);
109       }else{
110         this.manageBackspaceAndDeleteOpera();
111       }
112     },
113 
114     manageBackspaceAndDeleteOpera: function(){
115       this.inputTextElement.value=this.prevValueOpera.cursorPos.previousValue;
116       this.manageTheText(this.prevValueOpera.keycode,this.prevValueOpera.cursorPos);
117       this.prevValueOpera=null;
118     },
119 
120     setPreviousValue : function(event){
121         this.oldCursorPos=this.getCursorPosition();
122     },
123 
124     getValidatedKey : function(keycode, cursorPosition) {
125         var maskKey = this.maskArray[cursorPosition.start];
126         if(maskKey == '9'){
127             return keycode.pressedKey.match(/[0-9]/);
128         } else if(maskKey == 'L'){
129             return (keycode.pressedKey.match(/[A-Za-z]/))? keycode.pressedKey.toUpperCase(): null;
130         } else if(maskKey == 'l'){
131             return (keycode.pressedKey.match(/[A-Za-z]/))? keycode.pressedKey.toLowerCase(): null;
132         } else if(maskKey == 'A'){
133             return keycode.pressedKey.match(/[A-Za-z0-9]/);
134         } else if(maskKey){
135             return (keycode.pressedKey.match(new RegExp(maskKey)));
136         }
137         return(null);
138     },
139 
140     removeValueWhenInvalid : function() {
141         if(this.clearWhenInvalid && this.inputTextElement.value.indexOf('_') > -1){
142             this.inputTextElement.value = '';
143         }
144     },
145 
146     managePaste : function() {
147         if(this.oldCursorPos===null){
148           return;
149         }
150         var valuePasted=this.inputTextElement.value.substring(this.oldCursorPos.start,this.inputTextElement.value.length-(this.oldCursorPos.previousValue.length-this.oldCursorPos.end));
151         if(this.oldCursorPos.start<this.oldCursorPos.end){//there is selection...
152           this.oldCursorPos.previousValue=
153             this.oldCursorPos.previousValue.substring(0,this.oldCursorPos.start)+
154             this.viewMask.substring(this.oldCursorPos.start,this.oldCursorPos.end)+
155             this.oldCursorPos.previousValue.substring(this.oldCursorPos.end,this.oldCursorPos.previousValue.length);
156           valuePasted=valuePasted.substr(0,this.oldCursorPos.end-this.oldCursorPos.start);
157         }
158         this.inputTextElement.value=this.oldCursorPos.previousValue;
159         keycode={unicode :'',
160           isShiftPressed: false,
161           isTab: false,
162           isBackspace: false,
163           isLeftOrRightArrow: false,
164           isDelete: false,
165           pressedKey : ''
166         };
167         var charOk=false;
168         for(var i=0;i<valuePasted.length;i++){
169             keycode.pressedKey=valuePasted.substr(i,1);
170             keycode.unicode=valuePasted.charCodeAt(i);
171             this.oldCursorPos=this.skipMaskCharacters(keycode,this.oldCursorPos);
172             if(this.oldCursorPos===false){
173                 break;
174             }
175             if(this.injectValue(keycode,this.oldCursorPos)){
176                 charOk=true;
177                 this.moveCursorToPosition(keycode, this.oldCursorPos);
178                 this.oldCursorPos.previousValue=this.inputTextElement.value;
179                 this.oldCursorPos.start=this.oldCursorPos.start+1;
180             }
181         }
182         if(!charOk && this.oldCursorPos!==false){
183             this.moveCursorToPosition(null, this.oldCursorPos);
184         }
185         this.oldCursorPos=null;
186     },
187 
188     processKeyDown : function(e){
189         this.processMaskFormatting(e,'keydown');
190     },
191 
192     processKeyPress : function(e){
193         this.processMaskFormatting(e,'keypress');
194     },
195 
196     startTask : function(setOldCursor){
197       if(this.task===undefined){
198         this.task=new Ext.util.DelayedTask(this.managePaste,this);
199       }
200       if(setOldCursor!== false){
201         this.oldCursorPos=this.getCursorPosition();
202       }
203       this.task.delay(0);
204     },
205 
206     skipMaskCharacters : function(keycode, cursorPos){
207        if(cursorPos.start!=cursorPos.end && (keycode.isDelete || keycode.isBackspace)){
208          return(cursorPos);
209        }
210         while(this.specialChars.match(RegExp.escape(this.viewMask.charAt(((keycode.isBackspace)? cursorPos.start-1: cursorPos.start))))){
211             if(keycode.isBackspace) {
212                 cursorPos.dec();
213             } else {
214                 cursorPos.inc();
215             }
216             if(cursorPos.start >= cursorPos.previousValue.length || cursorPos.start < 0){
217                 return false;
218             }
219         }
220         return(cursorPos);
221     },
222 
223     isManagedByKeyDown : function(keycode){
224         if(keycode.isDelete || keycode.isBackspace){
225             return(true);
226         }
227         return(false);
228     },
229 
230     processMaskFormatting : function(e, type) {
231         this.oldCursorPos=null;
232         var cursorPos = this.getCursorPosition();
233         var keycode = this.getKeyCode(e, type);
234         if(keycode.unicode===0){//?? sometimes on Safari
235             return;
236         }
237         if((keycode.unicode==67 || keycode.unicode==99) && e.ctrlKey){//Ctrl+c, let's the browser manage it!
238             return;
239         }
240         if((keycode.unicode==88 || keycode.unicode==120) && e.ctrlKey){//Ctrl+x, manage paste
241             this.startTask();
242             return;
243         }
244         if((keycode.unicode==86 || keycode.unicode==118) && e.ctrlKey){//Ctrl+v, manage paste....
245             this.startTask();
246             return;
247         }
248         if((keycode.isBackspace || keycode.isDelete) && Ext.isOpera){
249           this.prevValueOpera={cursorPos: cursorPos, keycode: keycode};
250           return;
251         }
252         if(type=='keydown' && !this.isManagedByKeyDown(keycode)){
253             return true;
254         }
255         if(type=='keypress' && this.isManagedByKeyDown(keycode)){
256             return true;
257         }
258         if(this.handleEventBubble(e, keycode, type)){
259             return true;
260         }
261         return(this.manageTheText(keycode, cursorPos));
262     },
263 
264     manageTheText: function(keycode, cursorPos){
265       if(this.inputTextElement.value.length === 0){
266           this.inputTextElement.value = this.viewMask;
267       }
268       cursorPos=this.skipMaskCharacters(keycode, cursorPos);
269       if(cursorPos===false){
270           return false;
271       }
272       if(this.injectValue(keycode, cursorPos)){
273           this.moveCursorToPosition(keycode, cursorPos);
274       }
275       return(false);
276     },
277 
278     processMaskFocus : function(){
279         if(this.inputTextElement.value.length === 0){
280             var cursorPos = this.getCursorPosition();
281             this.inputTextElement.value = this.viewMask;
282             this.moveCursorToPosition(null, cursorPos);
283         }
284     },
285 
286     isManagedByBrowser : function(keyEvent, keycode, type){
287         if(((type=='keypress' && keyEvent.charCode===0) ||
288             type=='keydown') && (keycode.unicode==Ext.EventObject.TAB ||
289             keycode.unicode==Ext.EventObject.RETURN ||
290             keycode.unicode==Ext.EventObject.ENTER ||
291             keycode.unicode==Ext.EventObject.SHIFT ||
292             keycode.unicode==Ext.EventObject.CONTROL ||
293             keycode.unicode==Ext.EventObject.ESC ||
294             keycode.unicode==Ext.EventObject.PAGEUP ||
295             keycode.unicode==Ext.EventObject.PAGEDOWN ||
296             keycode.unicode==Ext.EventObject.END ||
297             keycode.unicode==Ext.EventObject.HOME ||
298             keycode.unicode==Ext.EventObject.LEFT ||
299             keycode.unicode==Ext.EventObject.UP ||
300             keycode.unicode==Ext.EventObject.RIGHT ||
301             keycode.unicode==Ext.EventObject.DOWN)){
302                 return(true);
303         }
304         return(false);
305     },
306 
307     handleEventBubble : function(keyEvent, keycode, type) {
308         try {
309             if(keycode && this.isManagedByBrowser(keyEvent, keycode, type)){
310                 return true;
311             }
312             keyEvent.stopEvent();
313             return false;
314         } catch(e) {
315             alert(e.message);
316         }
317     },
318 
319     getCursorPosition : function() {
320         var s, e, r;
321         if(this.inputTextElement.createTextRange){
322             r = document.selection.createRange().duplicate();
323             r.moveEnd('character', this.inputTextElement.value.length);
324             if(r.text === ''){
325                 s = this.inputTextElement.value.length;
326             } else {
327                 s = this.inputTextElement.value.lastIndexOf(r.text);
328             }
329             r = document.selection.createRange().duplicate();
330             r.moveStart('character', -this.inputTextElement.value.length);
331             e = r.text.length;
332         } else {
333             s = this.inputTextElement.selectionStart;
334             e = this.inputTextElement.selectionEnd;
335         }
336         return this.CursorPosition(s, e, r, this.inputTextElement.value);
337     },
338 
339     moveCursorToPosition : function(keycode, cursorPosition) {
340         var p = (!keycode || (keycode && keycode.isBackspace ))? cursorPosition.start: cursorPosition.start + 1;
341         if(this.inputTextElement.createTextRange){
342             cursorPosition.range.move('character', p);
343             cursorPosition.range.select();
344         } else {
345             this.inputTextElement.selectionStart = p;
346             this.inputTextElement.selectionEnd = p;
347         }
348     },
349 
350     injectValue : function(keycode, cursorPosition) {
351         if (!keycode.isDelete && keycode.unicode == cursorPosition.previousValue.charCodeAt(cursorPosition.start)){
352           return true;
353         }
354         var key;
355         if(!keycode.isDelete && !keycode.isBackspace){
356             key=this.getValidatedKey(keycode, cursorPosition);
357         } else {
358             if(cursorPosition.start == cursorPosition.end){
359                 key='_';
360                 if(keycode.isBackspace){
361                     cursorPosition.dec();
362                 }
363             } else {
364                 key=this.viewMask.substring(cursorPosition.start,cursorPosition.end);
365             }
366         }
367         if(key){
368             this.inputTextElement.value = cursorPosition.previousValue.substring(0,cursorPosition.start);
369             this.inputTextElement.value+= key +cursorPosition.previousValue.substring(cursorPosition.start + key.length,cursorPosition.previousValue.length);
370             return true;
371         }
372         return false;
373     },
374 
375     getKeyCode : function(onKeyDownEvent, type) {
376         var keycode = {};
377         keycode.unicode = onKeyDownEvent.getKey();
378         keycode.isShiftPressed = onKeyDownEvent.shiftKey;
379 
380         keycode.isDelete = ((onKeyDownEvent.getKey() == Ext.EventObject.DELETE && type=='keydown') || ( type=='keypress' && onKeyDownEvent.charCode===0 && onKeyDownEvent.keyCode == Ext.EventObject.DELETE))? true: false;
381         keycode.isTab = (onKeyDownEvent.getKey() == Ext.EventObject.TAB)? true: false;
382         keycode.isBackspace = (onKeyDownEvent.getKey() == Ext.EventObject.BACKSPACE)? true: false;
383         keycode.isLeftOrRightArrow = (onKeyDownEvent.getKey() == Ext.EventObject.LEFT || onKeyDownEvent.getKey() == Ext.EventObject.RIGHT)? true: false;
384         keycode.pressedKey = String.fromCharCode(keycode.unicode);
385         return(keycode);
386     },
387 
388     CursorPosition : function(start, end, range, previousValue) {
389         var cursorPosition = {};
390         cursorPosition.start = isNaN(start)? 0: start;
391         cursorPosition.end = isNaN(end)? 0: end;
392         cursorPosition.range = range;
393         cursorPosition.previousValue = previousValue;
394         cursorPosition.inc = function(){cursorPosition.start++;cursorPosition.end++;};
395         cursorPosition.dec = function(){cursorPosition.start--;cursorPosition.end--;};
396         return(cursorPosition);
397     }
398 };
399 
400 Ext.applyIf(RegExp, {
401   escape : function(str) {
402     return str.replace(/([.*+?^=!:${}()|[\]\/\\])/g, '\\$1');
403   }
404 });
405 
406 Ext.ux.InputTextMask=Ext.ux.netbox.InputTextMask;
